A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best Star Wars movie since The Empire Strikes Back with a great mix of action\, humour and nostalgia.  Certain elements may not have the conclusion that some fans were looking for but for me that makes it all the more intriguing.  I do feel that a lot of people will always find fault in a new Star Wars movie no matter what happens so just ignore a lot of the negative comments and enjoy the film as it's own spectacle...because it is extremely entertaining and passes the baton on nicely to the new generation of characters.
